attributes.title: Do not recommend
attributes.review: This app is horribly made. Why does it start by asking your phone number. I wanted to see what trump had to offer and didn’t have to offer in 2020. I do not want to give my phone number to someone who is running an app supporting such a horrible man. I do not recommend.

attributes.title: Complete hobknockers 🙄
attributes.review: I opened this app and was stunned by the stupidity of a person and lack of attractiveness from a orange, yellow faced disappointment on my screen. This app was no help and shut up trump bcuz your not gonna make “ aMeRiCa GrEaT aGaiN “ , like shut up. Not to mention but my screen is cracked once your face showed up , thanks for that 🙄

attributes.title: trumpie dumpie
attributes.review: ew🤢 this app is literally the worst!!! i hope trumpie boy can’t get mad because i’m only leaving a review about the app😪 i opened the app 🔛✔️ and i was met with the nastiest🤮 ugliest😑 most gargantuan🤯 quadruple chin-having 🤔 cheeto dusted 🧀 mammal 🐂 i have ever seen!!!!!!!!! ewwwwwwww it was so disgusting that i almost vomited 🤮 good thing i was wearing a mask😷 👍 unfortunately, some got on my phone 💸📲 and it is going to be very expensive to repair 😳 i hope trumpie is able to pay me a small loan of a million dollars for the physical and psychological damage he’s caused me as well as the destruction of my property 😿😿😿😿

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I was just on the app then my phone went to one percent. I already said something but taking tiktok away dosent help u control us and u won’t be able to shut down all of the apps that keep us in contact I support a lot of people but this isn’t the way it should be done

attributes.title: Unorganized
attributes.review: It took my brand new phone three hours to download the app and I am having trouble utilizing the app, it is very hard to get around it. Also, I wanted to point out that the app features a very orange man, with all due respect, I would like to recommend for him to change the place he’s tanning at.

attributes.title: BULLY
attributes.review: are we really gonna let this bully take away our american rights of freedom. you realize that him taking away tik tok is taking away our rights as americans. this app supports that and it is dumb. if this app does not come off the app store i will be getting rid of all apple products because they support this awful human. 🧚‍♂️✨🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: this is ✨𝓼𝓬𝓪𝓻𝔂✨
attributes.review: i got this app to educate myself on the cheeto that we sadly have as a president, it took so long to download and when i first opened the app all i saw was a 🍊ｏｒａｎｇｅ🍊 it made me 🧚‍♀️✨ｃｈｏｋｅ✨💕 on my water, i keeps sending me messages which is very annoying. i also bought a ticket to got to the rally but i forgot i need to walk my fish that day. i’ve had this app for a few hours and now i’m losing  ✨𝓫𝓻𝓪𝓲𝓷 𝓬𝓮𝓵𝓵𝓼✨ but anyways this is a very bad app just like the president,🇺🇸trump 2020🇺🇸 but in a✨𝓰𝓻𝓪𝓿𝓮✨.@trump you killed this ✨💕🧚🏽now do the same for urself🙈🥰⚡️💞.

attributes.title: crashes phone!!
attributes.review: I’ve been trying to use this app to confirm my tickets to the NH rally, and it DOES! NOT! WORK! It crashed 6 times while I was trying to open it, and on the last time, my phone completely turned off! Ever since I downloaded it, my phone has been abnormally slow. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!!!!!!!

attributes.title: bad
attributes.review: overall terrible app, made my phone crash multiple times even though it’s a fairly new phone. just don’t get it, it will fail and there’s so many ADS at least 10 per every five minutes, so terrible. seriously don’t get the app, waste of storage !! 😔✌️

attributes.title: Literally killed my cat
attributes.review: So I was super excited to open this app up, but then suddenly the app started making this horrible ringing noise. It became too unbearable to tolerate. My cat walks in and is immediately shocked by the sound. She collapses on the ground and is in a few seconds dead. So thanks this killed my cat. I hope they fix the ringing noise
